mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Term(shortName, engName, korName, meaning, deleteStatus, createUserId, createDate) VALUES (#{shortName}, #{engName}, #{korName}, #{meaning}, 0, #{createUser.memberId}, #{createDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE Term SET shortName=#{shortName}, engName=#{engName}, korName=#{korName}, meaning=#{meaning}, modifyUserId = #{modifyUser.memberId}, modifyDate = #{modifyDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Term WHERE deleteStatus = 0 AND (shortName = #{name} OR engName = #{name} OR korName = #{name})
SELECT * FROM Term WHERE deleteStatus = 0 AND (createUserId = #{userId} OR modifyUserId = #{userId})
